name: Fantasy Trio
description:
Information

Fantasy Trio is a 2D fantasy platformer. In the game player controls three characters, each with unique sets of abilities. The goal of the game is to reach the last level and defeat the boss. Also, there are some unique mechanics that are not revealed to the player, can you find them all? :)

Platform

The game playable in browser.

Current status

I made this game some time ago so if I will get some positive feedback I will consider adding new levels/functionality.

Feedback

Write any suggestions or thoughts that you have for the game, thanks!
